statements: UPDATE payment_processing_data SET amount = 100.50 WHERE transaction_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE payment_processing_data SET status = 'processed' WHERE transaction_id = '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE payment_processing_data SET payment_method = 'credit_card' WHERE status = 'pending';
UPDATE payment_processing_data SET amount = amount * 1.1 WHERE payment_method = 'credit_card';
UPDATE payment_processing_data SET status = 'failed', amount = amount * 0.9 WHERE status = 'pending' AND timestamp < NOW() - INTERVAL '1 day';
UPDATE payment_processing_data SET amount = CASE WHEN amount > 1000 THEN amount * 0.95 ELSE amount END WHERE status IN ('success', 'processed');
UPDATE payments SET payment_status = 'PAID' WHERE payment_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE payments SET payment_amount = 150.00 WHERE payment_id = '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE transactions SET transaction_status = 'PROCESSING' WHERE transaction_id = '323e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174002';
UPDATE payments SET payment_amount = payment_amount + 100 WHERE payment_status = 'pending';
UPDATE payments SET payment_amount = payment_amount * 1.1 WHERE payment_date <= NOW() - INTERVAL '1' DAY;
UPDATE transactions SET transaction_status = 'completed', transaction_date = NOW() WHERE transaction_id = '12fc68fc-62f4-4d8d-bc9d-383d44aec9b3';
UPDATE payment_transactions SET amount = 1000 WHERE transaction_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE payment_methods SET is_active = false WHERE method_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE users SET first_name = 'John' WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174002';
UPDATE payment_transactions SET amount = 100.50, status = 'completed' WHERE transaction_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE payment_methods SET is_active = FALSE WHERE method_id = '987e6543-a21b-43c5-b329-672989130876';
UPDATE users SET email = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE user_id = '654d321a-98b7-42c3-a123-098765432100';

UPDATE customers SET country = 'USA' WHERE customer_id = 2;
